required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effectiveness and Safety of Different Antithrombotic Therapy for the Treatment of Ventricular Thrombus
clinical_study.official_title: Effectiveness and Safety of Different Antithrombotic Therapy for the Treatment of Ventricular Thrombus

lead_sponsor.agency: China National Center for Cardiovascular Diseases

clinical_study.source: China National Center for Cardiovascular Diseases

brief_summary.textblock: To observe the effectiveness and safety of different therapies-non-vitamin K antagonist oral anticoagulants (NOACs) or vitamin K antagonists (VKAs) or antiplatelet agents and non-antithrombotic therapy - for the treatment of VT.

intervention.description: Collecting information of patients with VT who received NOACs
Collecting information of patients with VT who received VKAs
Collecting information of patients with VT who received antiplatelet agents
Collecting information of patients with VT without any antithrombotic therapy

study_pop.textblock: Patients who had a diagnosis of VT in Fuwai Hospital, National Center of Cardiovascular Diseases in China from July 2010 through October 2019.
